post.desc: While adult and mature Sakuya certainly fits the elegant epithet, I do feel like leaning towards the rather odd but still perfect maid you can find on the works of [**Risui**](https://mangadex.org/chapter/f3545514-a9fa-4528-ba32-9b71e52dc97e/1) or [**Zounose**](https://mangadex.org/chapter/680f29c2-281f-4555-b97e-9172b6b14285/18).
